meanings.definition: A person who is trained to help people with physical or mental health issues.
meanings.sent1: The therapists at the clinic are kind and understanding.
meanings.sent2: My sister is studying to become a therapists.
meanings.sent3: The therapists at the hospital had a dance-off to lift the patients' spirits.
meanings.sent4: The therapists were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the therapists who helped me through a tough time.
